text:
The New York Times coverage of the #P5report
www.nytimes.com/2023/12/07/s...

In a few min Hitoshi is going to present the report of the Particle Physics Project Prioritization Panel (P5). The recommendations cover the next 10 years, with a 20 year, global vision. It's the culmination of a huge community effort #P5report #QuantumUniverse
science.osti.gov/hep/hepap/Me...

The presentation of the report will be streamed in the webinar linked on this page
science.osti.gov/hep/hepap/Me...

This year I served on the Particle Physics Project Prioritization Panel (P5), which was tasked by the National Science Foundation & Dept. of Energy to make recommendations for the next 10 years! Tomorrow our report will be presented at 1PM ET.
www.usparticlephysics.org #P5report

Hi! I joined twitter in 2013 and gathered over 15k followers there tweeting about science (mainly physics), machine learning, AI, data science, open science, software, and the occasional joke, funny video, or striking image. I valued the community there, and hope to find something similar here.
